name: Dragon Clan's Worst Drummer (Barbarian 28/ Bard 2/ RDD 10)
author: eltalstro

posts.author: eltalstro
posts.content:
Hail,

I'm doing a run-through of Swordflight and humbly request a constructive critique of my build. I first went for 42 strength at level 40 forgoing the con increases after taking Dev Crit which resulted in a melee AB of 50. I decided that the Con and EDR were probably a necessity. I didn't know what to do about the annoying odd ability point so I just bunged it on Dex. Despite the bad will and reflex saves, I'm reasonably happy with it, but I'm sure the ECBG will have some valuable insight. I really wanted to take WF greatsword instead of scimitar, but it seems that this is a no-brainer. Or is it? Thoughts?

posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
Even with DR -15 and +4 AC from RDD, you may benefit from heavy armor and armor skin. The first is possible to squeeze in from the start (e.g. instead of toughness) and it is not too hard to get the AS either. But you have to drop one of knockdown, blind fight or heavy armor if you go the dev crit route and want to take all pre epic feats pre epic.
You don't need Con 22 when 21 gets the job done. It is not a stat that it is vital to max out, so it can end on an odd number if in a pinch.
If you start with a lower dex, you can also afford to start with int 12. That gives skill points so you can take intimidate, preparing for Terrifying rage. Dex items/potions let you reach dex 12 which is all you need for max AC with a heavy armor.

If you want dev crit, scimitar is the weapon of choice. if not, a two hander like the greatsword is the best damage dealer. And with DR -15 and a fair AC, going without a shield is definitely an option.

I will point at
The HOOD by Max
The Dragon-Blade by Tyr Templar
They both have dev crit, EDR III and terrifying rage. One has heavy armor, the other blind fight.
I will also point at
The Dragon Prophet by Valerfor
There is a human version with dev crit and a half-orc version without, pursuing pure strength instead. But neither have EDR.

I will also share something from my own folders. There is no dev crit though.
